mapper.select:
select stampNum, s.staNum, s.staName,ss.saleNum, m.userNum, m.userId,s.staAddress,l.locNum, l.locName,ss.sDate,ss.eDate from stamp st join station s on st.stanum = s.stanum join sale ss on ss.salenum = st.salenum join member2 m on ss.usernum = m.usernum join location l on l.locNum = s.locNum where m.userId = #{userId}
and s.staNum = #{staNum} and ss.saleNum = #{saleNum}

select stampNum, s.staNum, s.staName,ss.saleNum, m.userNum, m.userId,s.staAddress,l.locNum, l.locName from stamp st join station s on st.stanum = s.stanum join sale ss on ss.salenum = st.salenum join member2 m on ss.usernum = m.usernum join location l on l.locNum = s.locNum where s.staNum = #{staNum} and ss.saleNum = #{saleNum}

select nvl(count(*),0) from stamp st join station s on st.stanum = s.stanum join sale ss on ss.salenum = st.salenum join member2 m on ss.usernum = m.usernum join location l on l.locNum = s.locNum where m.userId = #{userId}
select staNum, staName, staAddress,s.locNum, locName,longitude, latitude from station s join location l on s.locNum = l.locNum
select saleNum, s.userNum, userId,ticketNum, sDate, eDate, s.created from sale s join member2 m on s.userNum = m.userNum where m.userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into stamp(stampNum, staNum, saleNum) values (STAMP_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{staNum},#{saleNum})
